description:
The battle between Luffy and Kaido comes to an unexpected end. Kaido comes down and tells everyone that Luffy has been defeated and the Land of Wano is finished. Momonosuke and Yamato argue over whether they should still continue fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Haiboku!? Nokosareta Mono no Kakugo
Luffy Is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
Luffy au tapis ? La détermination des survivants !
Ruffys Niederlage?! – Die Entschlossenheit der übrigen Leute
ルフィ敗北!? 残された者の覚悟
